summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.5°C) and outside temperature (down 2.6°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 5188 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12735 lux), cloud levels (up 1688 m), feels like temperature (up 5.4°C), and outside temperature (up 4.5°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Showers, occasional overcast conditions, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
